links.title: This Is the Fed's Most Brazen and Least Known Handout to Private Banks
links.description: Rarely does a day go by when some House Republican doesn't demand an end to Federal Reserve funding of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB). But you will never hear about the Fed's direct subsidy to private banks that costs over three times as much as the total CFPB budget.The subsidy comes in the form of a 6 percent dividend, paid on stock that over 2,900 banks purchase to participate ...
